channel.title: Jazz at Lincoln Center on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Jazz at Lincoln Center on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Wynton Marsalis to Premiere New Work, ‘Afro!,’ to Open Jazz at Lincoln Center’s ‘Mother Africa’ Season, Followed by Tour
item.description: Jazz at Lincoln Center will launch its “Mother Africa” season with the world premiere of “Afro!,” a new commission by managing and artistic director — and jazz legend — Wynton Marsalis, on Sept. 18–20
